short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is the browser companion for EHR context sharing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is the browser companion for EHR context sharing. In order to use this application, you must be an Innovaccer customer using the InNote point of care application.
